scripts.dev-build: tsc && zip -r lambda/bio-service.zip dist node_modules package.json package-lock.json && pushd ../infra && IS_DEV_ENV=true cdk synth; popd
scripts.prod-build: tsc && zip -r lambda/bio-service.zip dist node_modules package.json && pushd ../infra && cdk synth; popd
scripts.deploy: npm i && npm run prod-build && pushd ../infra && cdk deploy; popd
scripts.start: npm i && npm run dev-build && sam local start-api -t ../infra/cdk.out/BioStack.template.json -l lambda.logs --env-vars env/dev-env-vars.json
